dotnetType.name: NullSerializerBuilderCase
dotnetType.summary: A serializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.NullSchema" />.

returns.summary: An action that accepts an object and a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> and does nothing.

overloads.summary: Builds a null serializer for a type-schema pair.

returns.summary: Whether the schema is a <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.NullSchema" />.

overloads.summary: Determines whether the case can be applied to a schema.

returns.summary: Always true; the null serializer performs no operations.

overloads.summary: Determines whether the case can be applied to a type resolution.

typeSignatures.value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NullSerializerBuilderCase extends Chr.Avro.Serialization.BinarySerializerBuilderCase
